column5: I fished Minnitaki for the first time ever this weekend. Lots of water just wondering if anyone could point me in the direction of some walleyes any information would be very helpful and I greatly appreciate it Thanks in advanceMagicMan
Fished it once last year and going again in a couple of weekends. Had good luck up near Donnelly's home base and not far from there honestly.....barely went on the main lake.

Chutes going into Abram always produce fish. Big ones too. Main lake humps should have fish on them now. English and Rice river for numbers. You can't miss there. Mineshaft narrows can have decent fish there too.

Can you suggest the best area to throw or troll for large 40 + inch pike on this system??? P.S. for the walleye....jig and minnow, lindy rig with what style / color of flasher, or worms and leeches?? this mid July??? THANKS
Two of our three big pike have been caught in Redpine Bay, in the weedbed by the entrance.
